dialog.text: Top half is sky with clouds. There are mountain in the background with snows on it. The foreground is grass with tall rocks sticking out. Starting from the right, the rock goes from the tallest to shortest.
Got it. How tall is the mountain?
the mountain is in the middle but it is in the back ground. there are snow littered on the mountain tops. The main thing that stand out are the rocks and stones.
Yup. What is the weather like?
Clear sky. The clouds are mostly on the left side and someone them are behind the mountains.
Can you take a peek and see how it looks?
There are too much snows. The rocks needs to be way taller. The tallest rock is sticking out all the way to the sky
Maybe try putting some hills before the mountains.
Got it. How is it now?
The grass are too high. There should be a much clearer separation since it is in the foreground and mountain is in the back.
That is about the best I can do - the computer renders it weirdly. Anything else?
